data.prayer: Spirit, help the 5,113 believers find a person of peace today among the 785,687 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nakhon Pathom, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Nakhon Pathom, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Nakhon Pathom, Thailand to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 5,113 believers in Nakhon Pathom, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, encourage the 5,113 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 5,113 believers in Nakhon Pathom to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 785,687 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nakhon Pathom, Thailand has a population of 790,800.

We estimate Nakhon Pathom has 5,113 people who might know Jesus, 5,220 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 780,467 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 790,800 souls in Nakhon Pathom and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
